description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Battle Havoc is a fast paced multi-player action game with a unique twist on real-time artillery combat. Take to the air with rechargeable jets unleashing the power of over 20 different weapons and upgrades. Play Deathmatch or Elimination modes against 8 players over LIVE, System Link, or a single Xbox. Earn coveted Gold Medals as you race against the clock in 13 single-player time challenges.

Take to the air with rechargeable jets unleashing the power of over 20 different weapons and upgrades. Play Deathmatch or Elimination modes against 8 players over LIVE, System Link, or a single Xbox. Earn coveted Gold Medals as you race against the clock in 13 single-player time challenges.
